channel.title: Is being addicted to playing basketball bad?
channel.description: Okay, I know I haven't been active lately, but I'm back with a question. Is being addicted to basketball bad? I got NBA 2K12 and play it for an hour or two, then I go outside and play basketball. Then, my mom comes and always says, "Your always addicted to everything you touch." But really, is basketball bad to be addicted to? Heck, I only do Basketball for 3 - 4 hours and she makes a huge deal about it. So is it really that bad to be addicted to a sport?

item.title: Is being addicted to playing basketball bad?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

being addicted to anying can be bad if it controls your life, the sL of the situation is that it could be worse.

Read full topic

I’m always playing basketball.

item.title: Is being addicted to playing basketball bad?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I’m on the computer consistently because I live in the middle of fucking nowhere and the nearest town is a 20 minute drive. I don’t see how doing really much of anything for 4 hours a day is bad.

Read full topic
item.source: Is being addicted to playing basketball bad?

item.title: Is being addicted to playing basketball bad?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Pvp 508, post:13, topic:444349”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=547039.msg4010350#msg4010350 date=1339120676]
Okay, I know I haven’t been active lately, but I’m back with a question. Is being addicted to basketball bad? I got NBA 2K12 and play it for an hour or two, then I go outside and play basketball. Then, my mom comes and always says, “Your always addicted to everything you touch.” But really, is basketball bad to be addicted to? Heck, I only do Basketball for 3 - 4 hours and she makes a huge deal about it. So is it really that bad to be addicted to a sport?
[/quote]

NBA 2k12 for ps3 or what?
But 3-4 hours per day isn’t bad, if you were doing 6-8 hours per day it would be too much, Because everyone needs rest and you will be overdoing yourself.
I Myself used to play Basketball for 3-4 hours per day everyday besides the weekends, since those were my resting days.
But keep it up man, and tell your mom, atleast I’m not out doing drugs and getting females pregnant, so you shouldn’t really complain about me doing something constructive in my life.[/quote]

basketball isn’t any more constructive than doing drugs or getting ‘females pregnant’ though, it’s a sport, a leisure activity, it serves no constructive purpose bar entertainment

Read full topic
item.source: Is being addicted to playing basketball bad?

6-8 hours a day for a sport is too much?

I’m fucked then :S

@Pvp_508 wrote:

arham 4:

Okay, I know I haven’t been active lately, but I’m back with a question. Is being addicted to basketball bad? I got NBA 2K12 and play it for an hour or two, then I go outside and play basketball. Then, my mom comes and always says, “Your always addicted to everything you touch.” But really, is basketball bad to be addicted to? Heck, I only do Basketball for 3 - 4 hours and she makes a huge deal about it. So is it really that bad to be addicted to a sport?

NBA 2k12 for ps3 or what?
But 3-4 hours per day isn’t bad, if you were doing 6-8 hours per day it would be too much, Because everyone needs rest and you will be overdoing yourself.
I Myself used to play Basketball for 3-4 hours per day everyday besides the weekends, since those were my resting days.
But keep it up man, and tell your mom, atleast I’m not out doing drugs and getting females pregnant, so you shouldn’t really complain about me doing something constructive in my life.
